## Enumerations

### enum class  {#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum class llvm::AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod "
 labels = {["strong"]}>
Variants of check performed on an authenticated pointer.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754" />
<EnumerationListItem name="None">
Do not check the value at all
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a24204a7fa8ab4d609a76a48ac4673b22" />
<EnumerationListItem name="DummyLoad">
Perform a load to a temporary register
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a47343d56dc562d3a8366d3854eb64161" />
<EnumerationListItem name="HighBitsNoTBI">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> by comparing bits 62 and 61 of the authenticated address
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a1fb8b484947fc2d97a18d9b90e0c08fb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="XPACHint">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> by comparing the authenticated value with an XPAC-ed one without using PAuth instructions not encoded as HINT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10ae34527c9d45ac8d5e68634911bfcd36e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="XPAC">
Similar to XPACHint but using Armv8.3-only XPAC instruction, thus not restricted to LR:
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

In cases such as authenticating the LR value when performing a tail call or when re-signing a signed pointer with a different signing schema, a failed authentication may not generate an exception on its own and may create an authentication or signing oracle if not checked explicitly.

A number of check methods modify control flow in a similar way by rewriting the code


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;authenticate LR&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;more <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7e3e687ddfdcbacd404bcf17b917dd88">instructions</a>&gt;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


as follows:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  &lt;authenticate LR&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  &lt;method-specific checker&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">on&#95;fail:</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  brk &lt;code&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">on&#95;success:</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  &lt;more <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7e3e687ddfdcbacd404bcf17b917dd88">instructions</a>&gt;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
